overall_caption: Generate a comprehensive descriptive text (Upsampled Caption) that not only summarizes the core content but also includes background details, spatial relationships between objects, and the overall aesthetic style of the image.

scene.type: Scene Classification: e.g., Cyberpunk Street / Minimalist Home / E-commerce Poster / Ancient Landscape / Document Scan / IDE Interface, etc.
scene.world_knowledge: Common Sense Inference: e.g., Specific geographical/cultural background (e.g., 'Shibuya Crossing, Japan' instead of just 'street'), historical period (e.g., '80s Retro'), physical state (e.g., 'Zero Gravity').
scene.environment_structure: Environmental Layout: Describe materials and perspective relationships of the ground, walls, and sky, as well as blurred or easily overlooked elements in the background (e.g., distant mountains, clutter in corners).
scene.time_and_weather: Lighting & Weather: Specific time of day (e.g., 'Blue Hour'), weather details (e.g., 'reflections in rain puddles', 'dense fog').

camera.perspective: Professional Photography Terms: e.g., Fisheye Lens / Telephoto Compression / Macro / God's Eye View / Dutch Angle (tilted composition).
camera.composition_layout: Composition Forms: e.g., Rule of Thirds / Symmetrical / Leading Lines / Negative Space / Frame within a Frame / Dense Pattern. Pay special attention to the precise coordinate positioning of the subject.
camera.lighting_design: Lighting Analysis: e.g., Rembrandt Lighting / Rim Light / Cyberpunk Neon / Softbox Effect / Harsh Direct Light. Describe contrast (High Key / Low Key).
camera.color_palette: Color Analysis: Dominant color (Hex or description), secondary colors, color psychology (e.g., 'Melancholy Cool Blue'), saturation, and color temperature bias.

atmosphere_and_mood.emotional_tone: Emotional Tone: e.g., Serene / Tense / Cheerful / Lonely / Mysterious / Nostalgic.
atmosphere_and_mood.sensory_implication: Sensory Associations: Implied temperature (freezing/scorching), sound (noisy/quiet), smell (e.g., 'smoky atmosphere'), or tactile sensations.
atmosphere_and_mood.artistic_vibe: Artistic Vibe: e.g., Cinematic, Dreamy, Surreal, Minimalist, Epic.
atmosphere_and_mood.narrative_tension: Narrative Tension: Does the image freeze a dramatic moment? Is there conflict or suspense?

main_subjects.category: Subject Category: Precise classification (e.g., 'Special Forces soldier in tactical gear' instead of just 'person').
main_subjects.count: Count: Precise count; if dense and uncountable, describe density.
main_subjects.physical_attributes: Physical Attributes: Precise size proportions, shape structure, material physical properties (e.g., 'translucent frosted glass', 'reflective metal surface').
main_subjects.appearance_details: Appearance Details: Ultra-high fidelity details, such as skin texture (freckles/wrinkles/pores), fabric texture, mechanical wear and tear.
main_subjects.pose_and_action: Pose & Action: Tension of the pose, direction of movement implied by Motion Blur.
main_subjects.spatial_relationship: Spatial Relationship: Position relative to other objects (e.g., 'in the shadow under the table', 'blocking the window in the background').

analysis.typography: Typography Design: Font style (Serif/Handwritten/Calligraphy/Pixel), font weight, kerning, line height, alignment.
analysis.rendering_quality: Rendering Quality: Integration of text with the medium (e.g., 'carved indentations on stone', 'glow of neon tubes', 'ink bleeding on paper').
analysis.layout_role: Role in Layout: Main Headline / Decorative Background / Infographic / UI Button / Watermark.

fine_details.imperfections: Realistic Imperfections: e.g., Lens Flare, Grain, Scratches, Dust, Rust, Chromatic Aberration.
fine_details.material_physics: Material Physics: Light reflection on surfaces (Diffuse/Specular), Refraction (e.g., water droplets), Subsurface Scattering (e.g., translucency of skin/jade).
fine_details.small_elements: Tiny Elements: Buttons, stitching, pedestrians in the background, distant birds, water stains on a desk.

style_and_medium.medium: Creative Medium: e.g., 3D Render (Octane Render/Unreal Engine), Film Photography (Kodak Portra), Oil Painting (Impasto), Vector Illustration, UI Design Draft.
style_and_medium.aesthetic_score: Aesthetic Assessment: Compositional balance, color harmony, clarity, overall visual impact.
style_and_medium.design_elements: Design Elements: If graphic design, describe the style genre (e.g., Bauhaus / Memphis / Acid Graphics).

safety_and_constraints.sensitive_check: Check for violence, gore, NSFW content, copyrighted IP, and private personal information.
safety_and_constraints.hallucination_risk: Point out areas with potential logical errors or ambiguity leading to misinterpretation (e.g., 'abnormal number of fingers', 'text spelling errors').
